Articles.Content:
0450AM EST 04AUG2012

Forum Build Internal Version Number: 1.1

Added a new custom BB code to return "Spoiler" functions.

Rebuilt basic user groups and permissions

Rebuilt basic forum permissions

Re-enabled video code in posts in all forums (work in progress, will be finished in the coming hour)

Increased user attachment maximum usage to 2mb, up from 0kb

Increased Max number of images in a Sig to 5, up from 4

Added a new tab to the top Navigation bar that directs straight to the KSP Main Website

Added a new tab to the top Navigation bar that directs straight to the KSP Official Wiki

Added a new tab to the top Navigation bar that directs straight to the KSP Store Login

Added custom user group to handle bans

Updated auto-infraction system warning levels

Disabled reputation system pending review on proper set-up and usage.

Rebuilt post-count ranking system

Ran user title update maintenance

Color Scheme

Light Blue: Registered User

Dark Blue: Global Moderator

Purple: Community Manager

Yellow/Orange: Developer/Team KSP

Black: Test Team Member

Green: Moderator

Update: 0506AM EST 04AUG2012

Internal Forum Version Number: 1.1.1

Rebuilt Announcement forum permission set to disallow posting to all but developers, mods and admins.

Allowed "Reply" function to Announcement forum

Update: Sent out MASS Email to all Registered users explaining password reset process.

Be sure to check your Spam Folder!

Edited August 4, 2012 by Damion Rayne

Update: 0737AM EST 04AUG2012

Internal Forum Version Number 1.1.2

Fixed permission issues with Announcements, KSP Development Top and Bugs and Suggestions.

Update: 0744 AM EST 04AUG2012

Internal Forum Version Number: 1.2.0

Enabled User Album creation

Users may now create albums with pictures, basic BB code functions are turned on. Current max image quota is 25 images per user, this will change eventually.

IFVN: 1.2.1

Changed Date and time Settings

Display is now "Day, Month Year [24H Clock Time]

24 Hour Clock shows as this,

0100 to 1200 is AM

1300 to 2400/0000 is PM

Replaced Stock VB Logo with Kerbal Space Program Logo

Edited August 4, 2012 by Damion Rayne
Thanks for keeping us updated on the Forum Update progress, The new forum should come in handy.

IFVN: 1.3

* Encoding changed from ISO-8859-1 to UTF-8 to fix international charactersets.

If you're still having display issues, you may have to edit the post and fix it manually, since data in those posts that did not convert correctly will have been lost.

Changed the IFVN to 1.3,

Edited August 4, 2012 by Damion Rayne
Currently messing around with the forum style a bit.

IFVN 1.3.1

Reverted to default forum theme for now, pending new asset creation for a custom theme.

IFVN 1.4

Big Update here,

Created a new user group called "Curious George." , this is the default "Entry Level" group for all members. The first 5 posts for this group are placed into the moderation queue, this is to better combat spam and problems.

Created a user "Promotion" setting that automatically scans for users with 5 posts or more and "Promotes" them to the "Members" user group.

Increased default storage for PM's for all members

Increased default upload size for all members

Increased default album upload size and album size for all members

Rebuilt Post Count Ranks to the Following:

Bottle Rocketeer 5

Rocketeer 25

Rocketry Enthusiast 50

Spacecraft Engineer 100

Sr. Spacecraft Engineer 250

Junior Rocket Scientist 500

Rocket Scientist 750

Senior Rocket Scientist 1000

Capsule Communicator 1500

Flight Director 3000

Turned Video code on for all users.

Turned on permissions for users to edit and delete own posts.

Turned on permissions for users to delete own threads.

Numerous tweaks and maintenance.

Edited August 6, 2012 by Damion Rayne

IFVN 1.4.1

Enabled the user reputation system.

Disabled the ability to leave negative reputation.

Posted Rules about begging for rep, and or abusing the system.

Enabled thread rating system.

Posted rules about begging for ratings and or abusing the system.

Rules Posts are located here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15254-Forum-Rules

Edited August 6, 2012 by Damion Rayne
At the end of the development of the new forum, do you guys wanne make a new annoucenment tread with everything you need to know about the vBulletin forum for KSP?

I will yeah.

IFVN 1.4.2

Reduced Avatar settings to 64*64

Edited August 6, 2012 by Damion Rayne

IFVN 1.4.3

All Forums now actually have HTML and VIDEO code turned on, slight oversight with saving fixed.

IFVN 1.4.4

Changed all forum display options to the following settings, Last post First, Descending Order, Show All Posts

Turned on the Reputation and Rating System for all forums except Off Topic and Games.

Removed Archive forums, VB has a built in automatic archive function that can be accessed by click on the "Archive" button on the bottom right nav bar at the bottom of the page.

Maintenance:

Fixed some database overhead and optimized tables in the database.

Ran scheduled tasks

Updated user titles

Edited August 6, 2012 by Damion Rayne
Is the reputation system messed up? There are 562 users with reputation level "Is on a distinguished road". Most of them have not a single post.
It is a little goofed yes, it gives people rep who are brand new to the forums. I'll fix that later.

IFVN 1.4.5

Removed HTML code from Signatures, sorry but this was an over-ride from above me.

Increased Image Upload size to 2meg for album images

Increased User storage space to 20meg for "members", people with more than 10 posts.

Sorry guys, but this is all the space we have on the web server and we've only been allotted so much space for uploads. This might increase at a later date. -DR

A little question about the tag: right now, it seems to be limited to one video per post. Would it be possible that you increased/removed this limit? I have a thread listing several videos of mine (within spoilers of course), but they only appear as text with the tag, and I can't post if I try to add more than one video.

If you can't/won't do this, I guess I'll stick to the list I have now, which is a pretty minor issue:p.

Oh, and by the way, we need those Kerbal-themed smilies back!

Increased User storage space to 20meg for "members", people with more than 10 posts.
It's weird, it tells me I still have only 4Mb storage

And how about 10 000 characters limit for post size? Is there a chance for this limit to be increased -- or should I look for some other way to fix my old topics?
Any word on changing names? I had changed this one over to Rascal Nag a while back, but I can't seem to find anything that could do the same thing with vBulletin.

It's weird, it tells me I still have only 4Mb storage

And how about 10 000 characters limit for post size? Is there a chance for this limit to be increased -- or should I look for some other way to fix my old topics?

Tosh, I have NO clue what you are talking about...I can't change that post size limit, at least not that I've seen in the CP. As for storage..I updated it...I know for a fact I did, the CP says it's updated to 20meg.
Sense my posts were destroyed, could you possibly edit it to back up to 1010? I lost half my posts. Misterspork half his posts too, he was at 700.

Tosh, I have NO clue what you are talking about...I can't change that post size limit, at least not that I've seen in the CP.
Ah, I see, vB does not even support changing this. Thanks for your reply; I'll look for some other means to do what I need to.
As for storage..I updated it...I know for a fact I did, the CP says it's updated to 20meg.
Does it concern attachments storage only, or attachments + posts + PMs? In latter case, is there a way to view my entire used storage size ("Attachments" window in my Profile shows attachments only, and it tells I'm using 17.52 Megs... 2 Megs should be available for me -- but they are not, I'm getting "quota exceeded by 13.53 MB" message when trying to upload a small file )? Edited August 7, 2012 by Tosh
